sen.j: 倭迹迹姫命（やまとととひめのみこと、生没年未詳）は、孝元天皇の第一皇女。
sen.e: Princess Yamatototo Hime (Yamatototo Hime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death unknown) was the first princess of the Emperor Kogen.
Princess Yamatototo Hime (Yamatototo Hime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death unknown) was the first princess of the Emperor Kogen.
Princess Yamatototo Hime (Yamatototo Hime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death unknown) was the first princess of the Emperor Kogen.
The mother of Princess Yamatototo Hime was Utsushikome no Mikoto (she was the Empress of the Emperor Kogen).
The mother of Princess Yamatototo Hime was Utsushikome no Mikoto (she was the Empress of the Emperor Kogen).
The mother of Princess Yamatototo Hime was Utsushikome no Mikoto (she was the Empress of the Emperor Kogen).

sen.j: 同母兄に大彦命、少名日子建猪心命、開化天皇がいる。
sen.e: Prince Obiko (大彦命), Prince Sukunahiko Takeigokoro (少名日子建猪心命), and Emperor Kaika (開化天皇) were the maternal brothers (sons of the Emperor Kogen) of Princess Yamatototo Hime.
Prince Obiko, Prince Sukunahiko Takeigokoro, and Emperor Kaika were her maternal half-brothers.
sen.cmt: 同母兄を変更しました。
sen.e: Prince Obiko, Prince Sukunahiko Takeigokoro, and Emperor Kaika were her maternal half-brothers.

sen.j: 実績は伝わっていない。
sen.e: There are no written records of her (Princess Yamatototo Hime) achievements.
There are no written records of her (Princess Yamatototo Hime) achievements.
There are no written records of her (Princess Yamatototo Hime) achievements.
